Title: Bobby
Writer: V.R. Balagopal (dialogue), Thomas Chacko (dialogue), Shebi Chowghat (screenplay), Shebi Chowghat (story)
Actors: Mia George, Dharmajan Bolgatty, Noby Marcose, Reina Maria
Plot: A 21-year old boy, who gives up his Seminary Studies and falls in love with a lady who is 7 years elder to him. The movie showcases the funny events, romance and the love life of the couple.
